KnownIssues.English: Never load and play with the first Autosave of a new game. It is heavily bugged and also causes problem for many of my mods.
To better detect spies you can use Sonar, but if you dont own the SunkenTreasures DLC these detection-waves are not displayed.
Commanding multiple Police Units at once: Voice is about being a fleet and they leave a huge gap between them and also patrol for them and spy is hard. I dont know a way to fix this.

changelog.1.001:
Add ModioResourceId and changelog to modinfo.json
Fix the bug that -change owner- did not work. Now gifting ships, selling/buying ships and getting control of support fleet should work like intended.
changelog.1.002: Fix the bug that you were no longer able to buy a new flagship from neutral traders (my new code prevented it because flagship in general is not sellable, but in this case its intended to allow the buy..)
changelog.1.01:
Add English translation (thx LokiCharms).
- Add my new mod -MoreInfoTooltipsNew_Serp-. In a future update you will be able to see cargo of ships from spied players (and now already from allied players).
- New saboatage action: Add bad newspaper article to next newspaper (only makes sense against other humans)
- Add a 'Quest' which spawns a AI spy on your island if Rep is below 40. If you dont find and eliminate the spy within 10 minutes, sabotage will happen: bad news, steal money or bad reputation. So unlike the other AI spies you will have a Quest for this which shows you the island and the spy will not shoot at your buildings, but move around and only after the timelimit the sabotage will happen.
- several bugfixes:
- - Fix explosion doing no damage
- - Fix Easy setting to also properly reduce crafting time/costs in spy post building
- - using UniqueType for the barracks (Kaserne) building now, instead of my previous unfortunately unreliable code. Once per island.
- - Making the Participants Mercier and Pirates infectable by Incidents
